msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.l: And Moses called to allIsrael, and said to them, ‘You have seenall that the Lord did before your eyes in the landof Egypt to Pharaoh and to all his servants and to all his land,
The great tests which your eyes have seen,the signs and those great tokens.
But the Lord has not given you a mindto know and eyes to see and ears to hearuntil this day.
And I have led youforty years in the wilderness, your clothes have not worn awayon you, and your shoes have not worn away on your foot,
You have not eaten bread, and you have not drunk wine, andyou have not drunk strong drink, that you may know that I am the Lordyour God.
And you came to this place.And Sihon, king of Heshbon, and Og, kingof Bashan, came out against us, and we smote them.
And we took their land and gave it as inheritanceto the Reubenites and to the Gadites and to the halftribe of Manasseh.
And you shall keep thewords of this covenant and do them, that youmay prosper in all that you do.Parashat Nitzavim
You are standing today,all of you, before the Lord your God — your superiors,the superiors of your tribes, your elders and your overseers,all the men of Israel,
Your infants, your wives andyour stranger who is in your camp, from one who cutsyour wood to one who draws of your water —
For you to cross and enter into the covenant of the Lord your God andinto his curse, which the Lord your God makes with you today,
In order to establish you today for himas a people, and he will be a God to you ashe has said to you and as he has sworn to your fathers: to Abraham,to Isaac, and to Jacob.
It is notwith you alone that I am makingthis covenant and this curse,
But with the one who is here with us,stands today before the Lord our God, andalso with the one who is not here with us today.
Because you know that we stayed in the land of Egyptand that we passed among the kingdoms thatyou passed.
And you have seen their abominationsand their vanities, of wood and stone,of silver and gold, which were with them.

Lest there be among you a man or woman orfamily or tribe whose heart turns awaytoday from the service of the Lord our God to go and servethe gods of their kingdoms; lestthere be among you a root spreading poison and wormwood:

And it shall be, when he hears the wordsof this curse, that he will bless himselfin his heart, saying, “I will have peace, thoughI will walk in the obstinacy of my heart, so as to drive awaythe righteous and the wicked:

The Lord will not be willingto forgive his sin, because thenthe anger of the Lord and his jealousy will burn against that man,be it one man, be it a family,and he will lie on him all the curses that are writtenin this book, and the Lord will wipe out his namefrom under heaven.
And ifit is a tribe, the Lord will separate him, for bad,from of all the tribes of Israel, according to all the curses of thecovenant that is written in this Law, in the book.

Andthe next generation will say — your children that will rise upafter you and the foreigner that will come from a far land, andthey will see the punishments of that land and its illnesseswith which the Lord has made it ill,

Sulphurand salt, all the land will be a burnt, it will not be sown, andit will give no produce, and no plant will grow there,like the ruining of Sodom and Gomorrah, Admah and Zeboimwhich the Lord ruined with his anger and with his fury —
And all the kingdoms will say, “Whyhas the Lord done thus to this land? What is this burning of this greatanger?”
And they will say,“It is because they have left the covenant of the Lord, Godof their fathers, which he made with them when he brought them out from of the landof Egypt.
And they went and servedother gods and worshiped them, godswhom they had not known and whom God has not given to them as an inheritance.
And the anger of the Lord was kindledagainst this land to bring on it all thecurses that are written in this book.
Andthe Lord cast them out from their land in anger andgreat fury and great enragement and threw them into exile into another land,as it is this day.”
The secret thingsbelong to the Lord our God, and the revealed |things| are an obligation to be done,for us and for our children forever, to doall the words of this law.
